Moreover, you can learn 3,000 basic English & Arabic vocabulary quickly through exciting vocabulary games. Learning English & Arabic is easier than ever!

Features:

1. A collection of 2,000 common English & Arabic phrases, which are pronounced and divided into diverse topics, helping you to use English & Arabic fluently at anytime, anywhere.

2. Vocabulary games to help you learn the 3,000 basic English & Arabic words quickly and efficiently, for beginners.

3. A selection of basic-to-advanced daily updated English listening lessons.

4. The most advanced and accurate online English & Arabic translation software.

5. Available to search and learn vocabulary when there is no network!
